author: Stephanie Klinkenberger
text:
Hello: 
The City of Virginia Beach Storm Water Utility has two primary areas – Project Management and Operations, though there is some overlap (e.g., some small projects can be managed by Operations). When a request is generated (by City Council or upper level staff) that involves improvements to the existing storm water system, sometimes those requests are directed to the Project Management staff and at other times they are directed to Operations staff. Both areas are staffed by engineers who can handle the requests.
Does any locality have Storm Water Utility SOP’s that address how requests, such as improvements to the current system, are to be assigned within the Utility (Project Management vs. Operations)?
If you can assist, please email me at muniref@vbgov.com 
Many thanks. 
Stephanie
title: Storm Water Utility SOP's
